name: Bearly Stable
description:
The bear and the elephant are performing in a circus with their marvelous crowd-favourite show, but watch out!! The strongman is feeling jealous and is having none of that! He feels like his show is not as appreciated as yours and thats why he wants to ruin you and your mate’s performance!!! Keep the absolutely amazing show going on despite of this and remember to consume the delicious treats the audience is throwing at you!!

Art by Nobleboy

Programming by Ubr

Musics by Juckeyy
